alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Walworth and southeastern Rock Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Clinton, or 7 miles east of South Beloit, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Tiffany, Shopiere, Allens Grove, and Foxhollow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 39/90 between mile markers 183 and 186. Interstate 43 between mile markers 0 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
